moTa: The Cadillac ATS is available as a coupe and sedan. The 2018 ATS starts at $35,495 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $995. It gets EPA-estimated 22-25 MPG combined. The Cadillac ATS competes against models like the Chevrolet Malibu Hybrid, Honda Clarity Plug-In Hybrid, and Dodge Charger. The ATS is a good fit for luxury shoppers Luxury vehicles include all models from dedicated luxury brands plus luxurious models selected by our editors. .
